rules.name: myRule_1
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND (8 OR 9 OR 10) AND (11 OR 12) AND 13
rules.label: Lead Source Picklist values for Hot

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3) AND (4 OR 5 OR 6) AND (7 OR 8) AND 9
rules.label: Lead Source Picklist values for Warm

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6 OR 7) AND (8 OR 9) AND 10
rules.label: Lead Source Picklist values for Cold

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16) AND 17
rules.label: Not Interested Status
